channel.title: Portfolios on Michelle Meng's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Michelle Meng's Portfolio

item.title: Spotify Unwrapped
item.description: Spotify loves to use data to tell you about you. And data can tell us a lot about you. But data is just that- statistics and numbers; cold, hard facts. Using Spotify Unwrapped, you can document the music moments that data could never capture. AD: Michelle Meng, Katy van Nostrand

item.title: Lynwood Charlton Centre
item.description: The Lynwood Charlton Centre (LCC) is a modern, forward-thinking organization, committed to helping children & youth, but there is a disconnect with their branding and messaging. A more fun & current rebranding project is needed to help LCC reach prospective patients in a more engaging way. AD: Michelle Meng, Ashley Park

item.title: Beyond Bumble
item.description: Plant-based diets are growing in popularity but can lead to some challenges when it comes to dating. For plant-based eaters,Â it’s especially difficult to find a partner who eats like them. To make life easier, Beyond Meat is partnering with Bumble to help plant-based eaters match with each other. CW: Deryek Sandhu AD: Michelle Meng
